alert.note: Alert for Goodhue; Rice; Steele (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 8:10AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Steele, southwestern Goodhue and southeastern Rice Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 809 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Medford, or 6 miles northwest of Owatonna, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Owatonna, Faribault and Medford around 820 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Nerstrand. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 41 and 55. U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 166 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
